sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from "react"; function OrderHistoryPage({orderHistory, cancelOrder}){ const [isShowing, setIsShowing] = useState(false) return ( <>

Order History

    { orderHistory.map(order =>

      Customer: {order.customer.name}

      Items:

      { order.order_items.map(item =>
    • {item.product.name} | ${parseFloat(item.product.price).toFixed(2)} | x{item.quantity}
      • ) }

      Total: ${parseFloat(order.order_items.reduce( (total, item) => total + item.product.price * item.quantity, 0)).toFixed(2)}

    {order.customer.name}:

    Edit Order

    Cart

    ) }
) } export default OrderHistoryPage
